thread.title: Drake Gets Permanent Reminder Of "More Life"
thread.title_full: Drake Gets Permanent Reminder Of "More Life"

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Drake Gets Permanent Reminder Of "More Life"
text:
2 
For Drake, More Life must be an important project. 
The Toronto superstar immortalized his upcoming playlist by getting the image of a flower and bee that he’s been using to promote it as a tattoo on his shoulder. 
Swedish tattoo artist Niki Norberg shared the picture of the fresh ink on his Instagram, tagging Drake and celebrating the collaboration of nations with the Swedish and Canadian flags in the caption. A post shared by Art👈🏼 Tattoo👈🏼Laser👈🏼 (@niki23gtr) on Mar 18, 2017 at 3:38am PDT 
Drizzy’s other tats include a tribute to Aaliyah, a shark that matches Rihanna’s and a salute to Skepta’s Boy Better Know . 
More Life is set to debut tonight (March 18) on OVO Sound Radio at 6 p.m. EST/3 p.m. PST. The playlist is expected to hit sky-high numbers with as many as 400,000 equivalent album units its first week.
